verbose_text: The expression of Notch1, Notch2, Notch3 and the downstream target gene Hey-1 in HCT116, SW620 and LoVo cells was assessed using western blot analysis following the 48-h treatment of colon cancer cells with different niclosamide concentrations (1, 2 and 4 muM).
evidence: expression of Notch1, Notch2, Notch3 and the downstream target gene Hey-1
